main event: A ground visual observation of a silver dollar sized object that broke up into 5-6 smaller parts and burned up in the atmosphere.
interesting points: The object was first seen by a leather observer in the tower and pointed out to other tower operators.
The object followed an arc from 250 degrees to 230 degrees at an angle of 43 to 32 degrees elevation.
The object broke up into 5-6 smaller parts that seemed to burn up immediately.
The weather conditions were clear with good visibility.
sighted object: A silver dollar sized object that broke up into smaller parts
